p: The approach of various complementary therapies is becoming an increasingly used method of treatment. In this context, the use of plants for the treatment of various diseases plays a major role [ 1, 2, 3]. Folk medicine is widely used in much of the world, even though it is not officially recognized in many countries [ 4]. Over 80% of the population in Africa and Asia use plants and plant extracts for the treatment of various diseases [ 5].
